mapper.select: select t.taskno,t.cid,c.cname,c.pic_path,te.tid,te.tname from task t left join course c on t.cid=c.cid left join tea te on te.tid=c.tid where te.tid=#{param1}

SELECT pic.*, s.name, c.cname FROM ( SELECT * , ( SELECT CASE WHEN b.grade = -1 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT b.grade) END FROM learn b WHERE b.grade >= a.grade ) AS rank FROM learn a WHERE a.taskno = '27a28be9dc0410378c9eeae1a8a74c87' GROUP BY a.lno ORDER BY a.grade DESC ) pic LEFT JOIN stu s ON s.sno = pic.sno LEFT JOIN task t ON t.taskno = pic.taskno LEFT JOIN course c ON c.cid = t.cid
